original_solution_mapping.L1: Each classroom will have 14 boys because 56 boys divided into 4 classrooms equals 14 boys per classroom.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Each classroom will have 11 girls because 44 girls divided into 4 classrooms equals <<44/4=11>>11 girls per classroom.
original_solution_mapping.L3: In total, each classroom will have 25 students because 14 boys plus 11 girls equals 25 total students.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5873.
    Returns: the total number of students in each classroom.
    """
    # L1
    total_boys = 56 # 56 boys
    num_classrooms = 4 # 4 classrooms
    boys_per_classroom = total_boys / num_classrooms

    # L2
    total_girls = 44 # 44 girls
    girls_per_classroom = total_girls / num_classrooms

    # L3
    total_students_per_classroom = boys_per_classroom + girls_per_classroom

    # FA
    answer = total_students_per_classroom
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Each classroom will have {boys_per_classroom} boys because {total_boys} boys divided into {num_classrooms} classrooms equals {boys_per_classroom} boys per classroom.

Each classroom will have {girls_per_classroom} girls because {total_girls} girls divided into {num_classrooms} classrooms equals <<{total_girls}/{num_classrooms}={girls_per_classroom}>>{girls_per_classroom} girls per classroom.
In total, each classroom will have {total_students_per_classroom} students because {boys_per_classroom} boys plus {girls_per_classroom} girls equals {total_students_per_classroom} total students.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Each classroom will have 14 boys because 56 boys divided into 4 classrooms equals 14 boys per classroom.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Each classroom will have 11 girls because 44 girls divided into 4 classrooms equals <<44/4=11>>11 girls per classroom.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: In total, each classroom will have 70 students because 14 boys plus 56 girls equals 70 total students.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_boys' (value: 56) was used instead of 'girls_per_classroom' (value: 11.0).
